moves.1. e4: Well this game started with an classic opening, e4 which not gave e5 as it use to be
moves.1... b6 2. d4 Bb7 3. d5 e5: And the possibility to to capture blacks e-pawn by en´passant went possible but how next move in that case should become stopped me from doing it
moves.4. Nf3: I could also have threated pawn at e5 by Qh5 but thought to save that move to future in this game
moves.4... d6 5. Bg5 f6 6. Bh4 g5 7. Bg3 Nd7 8: Here did I opened for chance to check by Qh5+
moves.14... Nxg3 15. fxg3: And here does opening for the Rook comes
moves.15... h5: But the way to check by Qh5 got stopped by this move
moves.16. Nxf6+: And here is the first check in this game
moves.16... Ke7 17. Qf3 Nd4 18. Nd5+: And here is the second check, moving Kd7 had probably been the best move for black
moves.18... Ke6: But by this move so is check-mate possible
moves.19. Qf7#: And here is the game ended in check-mate
